kpi.name: m3072c0009

kpi_info.title: NUMBER OF UPLINK TCP PACKETS DROPPED DUE TO DOWNLINK FLOW INITIATION
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of uplink TCP packets dropped per session profile due to downlink flow initiation. The flow initiation direction is set through the flow-initiation parameter in the PCC rule filter configuration. UPDATED: Updated when an uplink TCP packet is dropped due to downlink flow initiation.

kpi.kpi_alias: NUMBER OF UPLINK TCP PACKETS DROPPED DUE TO DOWNLINK FLOW INITIATION
